title: Simon Gerrans on Milan-San Remo 2021: The Debrief
content:
We have a special pundit for a special Monument: 2012 winner Simon Gerrans joins Rouleur editor Andy McGrath and cycling journalist Amy Jones to run the rule over this year's Milan-San Remo, theÂ longest race in cycling.

What does it feel like to descend the Poggio in the lead? What was the key to Jasper Stuyven's triumph and Caleb Ewan's near miss? And why does Amy rate a rider called Taco? All this and much more in our latest video debrief.
author: Miles Baker-Clarke
